title: Repent + Reset: Breaking Patterns of Arguing
itunes:title: Repent + Reset: Breaking Patterns of Arguing
description: Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode answers the question on how plan better communication in the future after bad arguments and tempers have become the normal pattern of communication in a marriage.
content:encoded: Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode answers the question on how plan better communication in the future after bad arguments and tempers have become the normal pattern of communication in a marriage.
itunes:subtitle: Wives of Jannah Question and Answer Box Episode with Megan Wyatt
itunes:author: Megan Wyatt
